mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, REPLACE ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( t_user.create_time )* 1000, '.', '' ) AS create_time, address, email, mobile, sex, STATUS, REPLACE ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( birth )* 1000, '.', '' ) AS birth, role_name, nickname, work_status, post_name FROM t_user LEFT JOIN t_post ON t_user.post_id = t_post.post_id WHERE t_user.department_id = #{departmentId} and t_user.status = 1
